content.rendered:
How Much it Cost to advertise on Naijablog.ng

Currently, we have many positions, but price for (4) major position for advert placements on our website.

Naijablog advertisement price

1. Top Bar Big (728 X 90 beside our logo) – N300,000

2. Top Bar Small (468 X 60 beside our logo) – N250,000

3. Side Bar Big (300 X 600) – N150,000

4. Side Bar Small (200 X 200) – N150,000

5. Inside Post – ₦200,000 per advert

All advertisement expired after 3 months, and can be renewed.

Artwork to be provided by Advertisers, Saved in JPEG or GIF format.

Adverts should be pre-paid before Publication. All adverts are subject to legal vetting prior to publication.

Advert may be sent by e-mail (as attachment to Admin@naijablog.ng or omokoshaban@gmail.com) or submitted (by hand or through the post) in ZIP, CD, or a flash drive. Telephone: +234765509124

For more to inquire please contact our advert manager on;

Phone Number

07065509124

or

07050676733

Email:

Omokoshaban@gmail.com

Admin@Naijablog.ng
